name: ParameterChecker_checkParameterTypeTest
description: Unit tests for the ParameterChecker.checkParameterType method, which validates the type and content of parameters.

test_cases.name: testCheckParameterTypeValidString
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of a valid String parameter.

test_cases.name: testCheckParameterTypeInvalidType
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of an invalid parameter type (Integer instead of String), expecting a BinanceConnectorException.

test_cases.name: testCheckParameterTypeEmptyString
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of an empty String parameter, expecting a BinanceConnectorException.

test_cases.name: testCheckParameterTypeValidInteger
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of a valid Integer parameter.

test_cases.name: testCheckParameterTypeInvalidStringType
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of an invalid parameter type (Integer instead of String), expecting a BinanceConnectorException.
